response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value and is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal. I look forward to hearing your response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your business or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
